thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.es
thread.title: Mr Boris Dikken
thread.title_full: eDreams evaluado por Mr Boris Dikken

author: Mr Boris Dikken
title: Mr Boris Dikken
text:
Thanks to the help of costumer service I have been given a full refund on the hotel I had booked even though it was non refundable. I send them a certificate from my doctor and they managed to get me a full refund.
The flights were booked with low budget airlines so I already knew I had lost that money but that was only a small amount.
Thanks again for the excellent service even though it did take a while.
Thank you !!!
